pullRequest.title: BAEL-3900 Fixed ApplicationLiveTest.
pullRequest.bodyText: CSRF was messing the test, and security config for that component was missing. Added csrf().disable() (as this was set for other components in the same module). I assume there is nothing to change in the related article.

nodes.bodyText:
Can we format this new block properly using the appropriate formatter e.g eclipse:

commit.message: added notice on how to run the live tests
